definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
Kobe Bryant (1978-2020), Los Angeles Lakers NBA star
pinyin: Ke1 bi3 · Bu4 lai2 en1 te4

sentences.english: Blaine stopped to chat with a friend and Guiteau saw his chance.
sentences.chinese: 布萊恩停下來跟一位朋友聊天，吉特奧看到了機會。

sentences.english: A little something I wrote for Conan O'brien.
sentences.chinese: 少了一些，我寫了科南奧布萊恩。

sentences.english: Brian Flynn described himself as having been “ticked off for 22 years.
sentences.chinese: 布萊恩弗林自我描述到，“已經自責了22年”。

sentences.english: Can you tell us about people in Bryant Park?
sentences.chinese: 你能跟我們講講布萊恩公園裏的人嗎？

sentences.english: Professor Bryer will be giving a lecture on expressionism tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚布萊恩教授有一個關於表現主義的講座。

sentences.english: He warned Lisa Brown she would be going to prison for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 同事也告慰大家說麗薩布萊恩會被監禁很長一段時間。

sentences.english: I think of that story that all of you have probably read in school, The Things They Carried by Tim O'Brien.
sentences.chinese: 你們都在學校讀過奧布萊恩的，他們所攜帶之物。

sentences.english: "Can I give you a push, Debbie?" asks Brian.
sentences.chinese: “我可以推你嗎，戴比？”布萊恩問道。

sentences.english: Next up for Blaine, putting on some of the weight he’s lost.
sentences.chinese: 接下來布萊恩會做什麼，他要恢復這些天減掉的體重。

sentences.english: Brian and I worked together for several years before he moved on to other things.
sentences.chinese: 布萊恩和我一起工作了好幾年之後才轉到其他事情上。

sentences.english: Bandit stops moving, and Brian backs off.
sentences.chinese: 班迪特站定，而布萊恩退後。

sentences.english: A：Winning the spelling bee has really gone to Brian’s head.
sentences.chinese: 布萊恩在拼字比賽中拿了冠軍，讓他自覺不可一世。

sentences.english: Johnson told O Neal and Bryant .
sentences.chinese: 約翰遜告訴奧尼爾和布萊恩特。

sentences.english: " Chapter IV elaborates on O"Brien"s exalting construction of the images of the American soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 第四章探討了奧布萊恩對美國士兵形象的美化和頌揚。

sentences.english: Garfield won Blaine's support bynaimgnaming him Secretary of State.
sentences.chinese: 加菲爾德任命布萊恩爲國務卿，從而贏得了他的支持。

definition: the Franks (Germanic people who arrived in Europe from 600 AD and took over France)
